Why Use Beard Oil?

There's more reason to choose Organic Beard Supply Beard Oil than the fact that it's handcrafted in small batches.

Beard Health

In our day-to-day lives our beards are stripped of their natural nutrients. Organic Beard Supply Beard Oil replenishes your beard with the nutrients it needs to stay healthy.

Beard Growth

Whether you are growing your beard for a competition or just because you love having one, Organic Beard Supply Beard Oil will help your beard grow.

100% Organic

We care about what goes on and in our bodies and we know you do, too. So, we guarantee every ingredient used in our Beard Oils are 100% Organic.

Have questions? Visit our FAQ

You have questions, we have answers.




What ingredients are in Organic Beard Supply Beard Oils?

We take great care in what we put on our bodies and know you do, too. So, Organic Beard Supply Beard Oils are made with a unique blend of three USDA Organic base oils including Grape Seed, Jajoba, and Argan Oil. We then add just the right amount of USDA Organic essential oils to create different scents, each with their own distinct characteristics and benefits.

What is the correct way to apply Beard Oil?

Apply Beard Oil by putting a few drops of oil in the palm of your hand and rubbing them together. Run your hands through your beard working the oil in, then comb through your beard to evenly distribute the oil throughout your hair and to the skin underneath.

Are Organic Beard Supply Bread Oils really organic?

Yes! We go to great lengths to make sure that all of our base and essential oils are 100% USDA Organic.

What benefits do Organic Beard Supply Beard Oil Provide?

Beard oil is designed to replace what's stripped away from your beard on a daily basis and give it much needed vitamins and minerals to promote healthy hair growth and healthy skin under the beard. It can remedy things like bumps and stop the dreaded beard itch.
